props.navigateAwayWarning: Are you sure you want to navigate away? All progress in this form will be lost.

submission.message: Thank you for submitting your question. Your reference number is {reference}.

props.label: html 2
props.content:
If you have health concerns, you should refer to the NHS information or use the NHS 111 coronavirus service.

This form is for staff and managers with work-related questions about coronavirus (Covid-19) that are not health-related and are not already answered in the Frequently Asked Questions page on the intranet. Please check the FAQs before submitting a form, as we are working to make sure as much information as possible is available there.

If you complete the form, your question will be passed to the relevant department for a response, and we will get back to you as quickly as we can.

Privacy notice

We will process your personal information in accordance with data protection law. The personal details provided by you will be used to process your submission. Your details will be held in a database, and where the law allows and it is necessary to do so, may be shared with other departments within the council for the purposes of investigating and resolving the query you have raised. We may also be required to disclose personal information to other third party organisations such as the Police, Department for Work and Pensions or for the National Fraud Initiative for the purposes of preventing or detecting crime or apprehending or prosecuting offenders.

For further information about how the Council collects and uses personal information please view the privacy notice on our website.
